---
title: "About US"
---

[ARTbio](https://www.artbio.fr) has changed its scientific direction and is now **InforBio**!

*InforBio* is the bioinformatics platform of the Institute of Biology Paris-Seine ([IBPS](https://www.ibps.sorbonne-universite.fr/en)),
we provides support to biologists in their analyses, at the IBPS and beyond.
